title: Machine Learning for Everybody – Full Course
excerpt: Learn Machine Learning in a way that is accessible to absolute beginners. You will learn the basics of Machine Learning and how to use TensorFlow to implement many different concepts.  ✏️ Kylie Ying developed this course. Check out her channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/YCubed  ⭐️ Code and Resources
